entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add line brakes to user biography by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/829
  • Changed missing activitypub_user_description to activitypub_description by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/830
  • Fix undefined get_sample_permalink by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/832
  • Only send Update for previously-published posts by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/833
  • Add ordering for Extra fields by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/827

New Contributors

  • @danielhuesken made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.0.0...3.1.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor Media Handling a bit and add support for Seriously Simple Podcasting by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/839
  • Add Blog extra fields by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/838
  • Hide Bookmarklet if site does not support Blocks by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/851
  • Autoloader: log failure in addition to wp_die() by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/853
  • Replace hashtags, urls and mentions in summary with links by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/849
  • fix link detection for extra fields when spaces after the link and fiâ€¦ by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/857
  • Support "read more" for Activity-Summary by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/856
  • Add like handler by @janboddez in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/804
  • Simple Remote-Reply endpoint. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/866
  • Add "Stream" Plugin support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/863
  • Fix: wrong followers URL in "to" attribute of posts by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/874
  • Update yoast/phpunit-polyfills requirement from ^2.0 to ^3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/881

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.1.0...3.2.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve Accessibility for Reply-Context by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/885
  • Added documentation for setup behind reverse proxy with Apache by @jjschwarz in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/888
  • A CLI extention to help with manual updates, deletes and a self-destruct feature by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/867
  • It seems that Mastodon has issues with HTML in summaries by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/893

New Contributors

  • @jjschwarz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/888

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.2.2...3.2.3
